summary.span: 代表劃分的時間，例如週、月和年。

span.span: Represents time in divisions, such as weeks, months, and years.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行事曆會將時間分割成單元，例如週、 月和年。A calendar divides time into units, such as weeks, months, and years. 數字、 長度和的區間的開始使用不同的每個行事曆。The number, length, and start of the divisions vary in each calendar. > [!NOTE] > 如需.NET Framework 中使用的曆法類別資訊，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 任何時間點可以表示為一組數字使用特定曆法的值。Any moment in time can be represented as a set of numeric values using a particular calendar. 比方說，春分連接發生 (1999，3、 20、 8、 46、 0、 0.0) 西曆，也就是年 3 月 20，1999年For example, a vernal equinox occurred at (1999, 3, 20, 8, 46, 0, 0.0) in the Gregorian calendar, that is, March 20, 1999 C.E. 在 8:46:00:0.0。at 8:46:00:0.0. 實作可以對應至一組類似的數字的值的任何日期範圍內的特定行事曆和可以將這類的數值集對應至使用中的資訊的文字表示法和。An implementation of can map any date in the range of a specific calendar to a similar set of numeric values, and can map such sets of numeric values to a textual representation using information from and . 文字表示法可能會區分文化特性，例如，"上午 8:46 年 3 月 20 1999 AD"EN-US 文化特性，或不區分文化特性，例如，"1999年-03-20T08:46:00"採用 ISO 8601 格式。The textual representation can be culture-sensitive, for example, "8:46 AM March 20th 1999 AD" for the en-US culture, or culture-insensitive, for example, "1999-03-20T08:46:00" in ISO 8601 format. A實作可以定義一個或多個紀元。A implementation can define one or more eras. 類別識別為列舉整數、 紀元其中目前的紀元 () 值是 0。The class identifies the eras as enumerated integers, where the current era () has the value 0. 組成日曆年度與實際時間地球與太陽繞或月亮繞地球的實際時間之間的差異，閏年有不同數目的天從 標準的日曆年度。To make up for the difference between the calendar year and the actual time that the earth rotates around the sun or the actual time that the moon rotates around the earth, a leap year has a different number of days from a standard calendar year. 每個實作以不同的方式定義潤年。Each implementation defines leap years differently. 為了保持一致性，每個間隔 （第一個月，例如） 中的第一個單位會指派值 1。For consistency, the first unit in each interval (the first month, for example) is assigned the value 1. 命名空間包含下列實作：The namespace includes the following implementations: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範成員類別。The following code example demonstrates the members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.Calendar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar/CPP/calendar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar/CS/calendar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar/VB/calendar.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `months`值加入至指定。The `months` value is added to the specified . 如果`months`是負數，產生早於指定。If `months` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 產生的紀元部分如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會影響。The era part of the resulting is affected if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，假設現行曆法有 12 個月，其中的第四個月有 30 天和第十個月有 31 天。For example, suppose that the current calendar has 12 months, where the fourth month has 30 days and the tenth month has 31 days. 如果指定的月份的第十個月份，在特定的日期是該月第 31 天的值的`months`參數為 6，產生的年份會一個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是第四個月，而且產生的日期是 30天，產生的月份的最後一天。If the specified month is the tenth month, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is the fourth month, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day of the resulting month. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. remarks.format: ## Remarks `years`值加入至指定。The `years` value is added to the specified . 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分如果產生的月份不是有效的月中產生的年份會受到影響。The month part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is not a valid month in the resulting year. 它會變更為有效結果年的月。It is changed to the last valid month in the resulting year. 產生的紀元部分如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會影響。The era part of the resulting is affected if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，西曆，二月有 28 天，除了閏年時有 29 天。For example, in the Gregorian calendar, February has 28 days, except during a leap year when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是潤年 2 月 29 日值`years`為 1，則產生的日期是一年中的 2 月 28 日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. remarks.format: ## Remarks 曆法，支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組成日曆年度與實際時間地球與太陽繞或月亮繞地球的實際時間之間的差異，閏年有不同數目的天從 標準的日曆年度。To make up for the difference between the calendar year and the actual time that the earth rotates around the sun or the actual time that the moon rotates around the earth, a leap year has a different number of days from a standard calendar year. 每個實作以不同的方式定義潤年。Each implementation defines leap years differently. 為閏月是只發生在閏年整個月。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 例如，在希伯來曆法，Adar Beit 是唯一的閏月。For example, in the Hebrew calendar, Adar Beit is the only leap month. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較不同的實作類別。The following code example compares different implementations of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，因為它可以將任何以現行曆法的日期轉換成的西曆日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 西曆日期之後可用，例如，比較在不同的行事曆中的日期，或建立特定的日曆中的相等的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

param.name: year
param.span: 兩位數或四位數整數，代表要轉換的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換為 4 位數年份，方法是使用 屬性以判斷適當的世紀。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以兩位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍中的最後一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 世紀所找到的兩位數的唯一項目決定`year`該 100 年範圍內。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 2029，100 年範圍是從 1930年到 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 如果`year`大於或等於 100 的值`year`會原封不動地傳回。If `year` is greater than or equal to 100, the value of `year` is returned unchanged. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許 2 位數的年份的 4 位數年份正確轉譯。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果這個屬性設定為 2029年，100 年範圍是從 1930年到 2029年。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 這個屬性的起始值被衍生自 控制台 的地區及語言選項 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，該資訊可以變更的生命期限內。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定中變更自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 如果地區及語言選項不支援行事曆，這個屬性的初始值是所定義的預設值類別。If the calendar is not supported in the regional and language options, the initial value of this property is the default value defined by the class. 您的應用程式應該將此值為 99，表示就其字面 2 位數的年份。Your application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 目前的 物件是唯讀的。
